'''Oromino''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A dirty, naked man presses the length of his body up against the bars.}}
Oromino is a member of [Lamond](/lamond/)'s crew kept under lock and key as punishment for Lamond's insubordination.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved = [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/): You can save him to allow Lamond to have his revenge.
